original_title: Watch The K Foundation Burn a Million Quid
overview: Former members of the techno music group The KLF Bill Drummond and Jimi Cauty after forming a new "art collective" named the K Foundation burn 1 million UK pounds of their own money in a shack on the Isle of Jura while being taped by their roadie, Gimpo.
tagline: On the 23rd August 1994 Jimmy Cauty and Bill Drummond set fire to Â£1 000 000 of their own money and burnt the lot. All they ask of you is to tell them why.
title: Watch The K Foundation Burn a Million Quid
